message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my product's value is closer to my initial offer. How about we meet in the middle at $13,250? This considers both our interests.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that number. How about we try $12,000? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. I'm willing to accept $12,750, which is a significant reduction from my initial offer. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,750 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but no more. This is my final offer.
